highlights.1: Demonstrating efficient skills in full stack application building with tools such as React, Laravel and PostreSQL.
highlights.2: Presenting efficient and clear communication in both written and oral methods.
highlights.3: Exceling in a team environment, as well as independently.

skills.1: Graduated from the Information and Computer Systems Diploma program.
skills.2: Wrote, edited, and debugged programs in various languages, such as Java, Python, C, C++, C#, and iOS Development with Swift
skills.3: Demonstrated a mobile-first approach by creating fully responsive websites using HTML, CSS and JavaScript
skills.4: Created full-stack applications using React/Next.js, or React/Laravel, with TailwindCSS syling, and deployment with Amazon Web Services.

responsibilities.1: Guiding a team daily, navigating though challenges together, resulting in some record breaking sales for the store.
responsibilities.2: Facilitating the onboarding and training of new hires, and ensuring proper training requirements and understanding are both met though verifying learning and confidence skills.
responsibilities.3: Apply quick problem solving of both customer issues, and business issues as they arise, with minimal impact to operations.

responsibilities.1: Curated genuine connections with customers with high satisfaction rating.
responsibilities.2: Consulted customer questions and concerns quickly and efficiently.
responsibilities.3: Recommended changes to services to best suit needs, and informed on services that might be unknown, and benefits over competitors.
responsibilities.4: Reported to supervisor weekly in both written and oral communication.

responsibilities.1: Implemented planograms around the store down to the smallest details.
responsibilities.2: Oversaw deliveries of store signage and fixtures and implemented them on time.
responsibilities.3: Advised customers on products and services offered to meet their needs to great satisfaction.

responsibilities.2: Oversaw and implemented a strict cleaning routine to great results.
responsibilities.4: Assisted manager with scheduling, ordering, inventory, and waste control needs.

future_projects.1: GigPlanr: A Setlist Builder for Musicians, by Musicians.
future_projects.2: Plans to overhaul band website, complete with shop section, photo gallery, more in-depth bio section and a place to showcase released music.
future_projects.3: Plans to develop an organized, modern environment to showcase photography.

extracurricular.1: Engineering music recording sessions with artists/bands.
extracurricular.2: Writing and performing original music, along with some cover songs.
